detaileddescription.para: Initialize a SQHamiltonian for one- and two-electron contributions.

parameterdescription.para: The contributions to the total one-electron interaction operator.
The contributions to the total two-electron interaction operator.

detaileddescription.para: Create an SQHamiltonian from total one- and two-electron contributions.

parameterdescription.para: The total one-electron interaction operator, i.e. the core Hamiltonian.
The total two-electron interaction operator.

simplesect.para: A read-only reference to the total one-electron interaction operator, i.e. the core Hamiltonian.
A writable reference to the total one-electron interaction operator, i.e. the core Hamiltonian.
A read-only reference to the contributions to the total one-electron interaction operator.
A writable reference to the contributions to the total one-electron interaction operator.
A read-only reference to the total two-electron interaction operator.
A writable reference to the total two-electron interaction operator.
A read-only reference to the contributions to the total two-electron interaction operator.
A writable reference to the contributions to the total two-electron interaction operator.
The number of orbitals (spinors or spin-orbitals, depending on the context) this second-quantized Hamiltonian is related to.

memberdef.type: enable_if_t< std::is_same< Z, RestrictedSpinOrbitalTag >::value||std::is_same< Z, GeneralSpinorTag >::value, double >
memberdef.definition: enable_if_t<std::is_same<Z, RestrictedSpinOrbitalTag>::value || std::is_same<Z, GeneralSpinorTag>::value, double> GQCP::SQHamiltonian< _ScalarSQOneElectronOperator, _ScalarSQTwoElectronOperator >::calculateEdmistonRuedenbergLocalizationIndex
memberdef.name: calculateEdmistonRuedenbergLocalizationIndex

detaileddescription.para: Calculate the Edmiston-Ruedenberg localization index, which is the trace of the two-electron integrals over only the occupied orbitals.

parameterdescription.para: An orbital space which denotes the occupied-active-virtual separation.

simplesect.para: The Edmiston-Ruedenberg localization index.
This method is not enabled for unrestricted Hamiltonians.

memberdef.type: enable_if_t< std::is_same< Z, RestrictedSpinOrbitalTag >::value||std::is_same< Z, GeneralSpinorTag >::value, ScalarSQOneElectronOperator >
memberdef.definition: enable_if_t<std::is_same<Z, RestrictedSpinOrbitalTag>::value || std::is_same<Z, GeneralSpinorTag>::value, ScalarSQOneElectronOperator> GQCP::SQHamiltonian< _ScalarSQOneElectronOperator, _ScalarSQTwoElectronOperator >::calculateEffectiveOneElectronIntegrals
memberdef.name: calculateEffectiveOneElectronIntegrals

detaileddescription.para: Calculate the effective one-electron integrals. These are the core integrals, with the contributions form a Kronecker delta-term in the two-electron integrals.

simplesect.para: The effective one-electron integrals.
This method is not enabled for unrestricted Hamiltonians.

detaileddescription.para: Calculate the electronic energy, i.e. the expectation value of this Hamiltonian.

parameterdescription.para: The 1-DM.
The 2-DM.

simplesect.para: The expectation value of this Hamiltonian.

This method is not enabled for unrestricted Hamiltonians.
